Repository Name Unauthorized: Blount County Historical Society and Museum
Notes: Houses a museum that pays tribute to Blount County heritage and Blount County War Veterans.  The collection contains over 1000 research volumes and 500 files on Blount County families. The museum has artifacts from Blount, Cullman, Etowah, Madison, Marshall, and St. Clair Counties.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
